description: Deputy Jonathan Le Tocq has been advised to rest for a few weeks after a "minor heart attack".
title: Guernsey's lead Brexit politician takes time off after heart attack
title_page: Guernsey's lead Brexit politician takes time off after heart attack - BBC News
maintext: The news comes just as the UK and the European Union are entering the final phase of Brexit negotiations, with the prospect of the UK leaving without a trade deal on 1 January if an agreement cannot be reached.
